title: New: Gleemer – Tarantula
body:
Corey Coffmanhas followed up on last month’s release of his debut full length with a new Gleemer track, ‘Tarantula’_,_ againavailable for free download via Soundcloud.

It’s another strong display of the songwriting talent we got to hear on _Death Sky, Soft Eye_**_,_ **and from the sounds of it Coffman isn’t planning on changing up his supposed [late night recording schedule](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/19179-introducing-gleemer/) at Brooklyn’s Atlantic Sound Studios anytime soon. ‘Tarantula’broods and argues through an epic four and a half minutes of expansive guitars and Coffman’sbeautifully yearning voice, describing what sounds like a failing relationship being played out against the backdrop of a dark, lonely city. Listen/download below.
